elements.title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Aishwarya Rai Bachchan (pictured) was the first Indian actress to be a juror at the Cannes Film Festival?

elements.title: Cosmic Ray (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bruce Conner conceived of his short film Cosmic Ray as "presenting the eyes" for blind musician Ray Charles?

elements.title: Giovanni Manu (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Giovanni Manu was the first player from his university ever to be selected in the NFL draft?

elements.title: sunlight before signing (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Barack Obama made an election promise to make non-emergency bills freely available online for a five-day public consultation period under "sunlight before signing"?

elements.title: Bob Noel (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Bob Noel was the one responsible for dealing "with all the dirty laundry" of the Green Bay Packers?

elements.title: New England Revolution manager (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that New England Revolution manager Bruce Arena led the club to a record-breaking 73 points in the 2021 season?

elements.title: North West (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that North West was originally going to be called Kaidence?

elements.title: Lock's Quest (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Lock's Quest was said to feature "some of the best original music in a DS game"?

elements.title: 69 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that 69 is "nice"?
